about_the_game:
💥 Step into the ring with Lou Ratchett, bringing his raw energy and unfiltered style to Backyard Boxing. Whether he’s talking his talk or throwing hands, Lou’s presence makes every fight feel personal. No gimmicks—just straight action.

👊 Coming Soon:
Different versions of Lou are on the way, each bringing a new vibe to the fight. Plus, the Pittsburgh map is dropping, bringing that real hometown energy to the game. If you’re stepping in, you better come correct. 🏙️🔥
detailed_description:
💥 Step into the ring with Lou Ratchett, bringing his raw energy and unfiltered style to Backyard Boxing. Whether he’s talking his talk or throwing hands, Lou’s presence makes every fight feel personal. No gimmicks—just straight action.

Different versions of Lou are on the way, each bringing a new vibe to the fight. Plus, the Pittsburgh map is dropping, bringing that real hometown energy to the game. If you’re stepping in, you better come correct. 🏙️🔥

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD processor (3.5 GHz or faster)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1080, AMD Radeon RX Vega 64, Or Higher
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 13 GB available space

short_description: Step into the backyard as Lou Ratchett, bringing his signature style and energy to the fight. This DLC lets you take on opponents as Lou, repping his unique look and presence in the ring.
